website_summaries.verdict: A fashion-forward work boot that can go almost anywhere.
pros: These low profile boots are comfortable for all-day wear and very supportive
They make a great travel staple – they can go from cobbled streets to mountain hikes and then to a restaurant
cons: The sizing seems to be tricky – it's advisable to consult the manufacturer's sizing charts

customer_reviews.title: New favorite work boots
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these from the main website and from here and both pairs are exactly the same. They are so comfortable and are really great for people who are on their feet a lot. I work security and I've worn these every shift for a year now and I couldn't be happier. The shock support and slip resistance is amazing and they are really easy to clean and shine. I can't speak for if they are waterproof or water resistant but they definitely keep my feet dry. I am 21 have really bad knees and I don't feel nearly as much soreness at the end of the day when I wear these.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible boots. Doesn’t live up to thorogood name. Had for a month and they already looked worn & torn. Stretched in the wrong spots and don’t stretch in the spots I needed. Laces slip no matter how I tie or lace. The soles have completely flattened out. No support and you can feel the stitching on top of foot. They are slip proof on the wet but not oil.
customer_reviews.author: nida

customer_reviews.title: Shoe is very tight/narrow inside where the laces end
customer_reviews.text: It cuts across the top of my foot wear shoe laces end. I've not had a shoe that was not tall enough for my foot to fit in. I don't think this shoe was cut correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Corwin

customer_reviews.title: Someting wrong when you made this stupid shoes!
customer_reviews.text: It was expensive not a comfortable shoes as expected for that price every time i wear them got me sick i feel too tired and make me headache i DO NOT RECOMEND This shoes not even fir that price please do not loose your money i bouth it for work you can imagen how hard is work with very unconfirtable shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley M.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable I need them for work
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable I need them for work, I have to stand for a long period of time sometimes up to 10 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality boot however the fit was larger than expected and extremely wide. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: AudiED

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These boots are made of soft leather, are very comfortable and look good with jeans. I got them in size 7.5 M. They feel a little larger than my other size 7.5 shoes, so I added an insole and they now fit well. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, excellent delivery. I had to return the boots, though, as they run small...
customer_reviews.author: Anna Zeppelina

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Work Boot
customer_reviews.text: Very nice work boot but a little narrow. I’m glad I ordered a size bigger in order to put on a thicker sock for the winter...Lastly, a little heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Mia G Outten

customer_reviews.title: Nice pair of boots to work but they run a ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice pair of boots to work but they run a litle big, I wear size 10 bit I should ordered 9.5.
customer_reviews.author: Isa

customer_reviews.title: I find a women's heel is narrow, and most ...
customer_reviews.text: I find a women's heel is narrow, and most shoes are not designed as such. Except the Ryka shoes, other wise I am very please with all the walking I do.
customer_reviews.author: Denise J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable work shoe I've ever worn
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable, supportive, breathable, well-fitted. I'm on my second pair. It took a while to do it but I wore out the first pair and couldn't find anything else that came close. I hope these boots are always available because I'll have a pair until I die.
customer_reviews.author: Charlayne Barger

product_meta.title: Thorogood Women's Soft Streets Series - Plain Toe Chukka, Non-Safety Toe Shoe
product_meta.description: You’re on your feet all day, and these Made in the USA, Berry Compliant, Postal Certified, Plain Toe Chukka Shoes bear the load like a champ. Our exclusive Soft Streets dual-density polyurethane direct injected outsole gives you time-tested comfort and flexibility. The removable, single-density Comfort 125 polyurethane insole contains a contour heel cup for maximum support and comfort. These full-grain leather chukka shoes are slip- and electric hazard-resistant for added protection, and they don’t stop working until you do.
